## Message type

Describes a message displayed at the top of the screen. Can include embedded buttons or other objects.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type Message = string | {
    format: string;
    args?: MessageEmbed[];
};
```
**References:** [MessageEmbed](./bge-core.messageembed.md)
